argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nmods.n | |- N = ( S normOp T ) |
| 2 |  | nmods.v | |- V = ( Base ` S ) |
| 3 |  | nmods.c | |- C = ( dist ` S ) |
| 4 |  | nmods.d | |- D = ( dist ` T ) |
| 5 |  | #P_simp1 | |- ( ( F e. ( S NGHom T ) /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> F e. ( S NGHom T ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_nghmrcl1 | |- ( F e. ( S NGHom T ) -> S e. NrmGrp ) |
| 7 |  | #P_ngpgrp | |- ( S e. NrmGrp -> S e. Grp ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( F e. ( S NGHom T ) -> S e. Grp ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( -g ` S ) = ( -g ` S ) |
| 10 | 2, 9 | #P_grpsubcl | |- ( ( S e. Grp /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> ( A ( -g ` S ) B ) e. V ) |
| 11 | 8, 10 | #P_syl3an1 | |- ( ( F e. ( S NGHom T ) /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> ( A ( -g ` S ) B ) e. V ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( norm ` S ) = ( norm ` S ) |
| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( norm ` T ) = ( norm ` T ) |
| 14 | 1, 2, 12, 13 | #P_nmoi | |- ( ( F e. ( S NGHom T ) /\ ( A ( -g ` S ) B ) e. V ) -> ( ( norm ` T ) ` ( F ` ( A ( -g ` S ) B ) ) ) <_ ( ( N ` F ) x. ( ( norm ` S ) ` ( A ( -g ` S ) B ) ) ) ) |
| 15 | 5, 11, 14 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( F e. ( S NGHom T ) /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> ( ( norm ` T ) ` ( F ` ( A ( -g ` S ) B ) ) ) <_ ( ( N ` F ) x. ( ( norm ` S ) ` ( A ( -g ` S ) B ) ) ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_nghmrcl2 | |- ( F e. ( S NGHom T ) -> T e. NrmGrp ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( F e. ( S NGHom T ) /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> T e. NrmGrp ) |
| 18 |  | #P_nghmghm | |- ( F e. ( S NGHom T ) -> F e. ( S GrpHom T ) ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( F e. ( S NGHom T ) /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> F e. ( S GrpHom T ) ) |
| 20 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` T ) = ( Base ` T ) |
| 21 | 2, 20 | #P_ghmf | |- ( F e. ( S GrpHom T ) -> F : V --> ( Base ` T ) ) |
| 22 | 19, 21 | #P_syl | |- ( ( F e. ( S NGHom T ) /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> F : V --> ( Base ` T ) ) |
| 23 |  | #P_simp2 | |- ( ( F e. ( S NGHom T ) /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> A e. V ) |
| 24 | 22, 23 | #P_ffvelrnd | |- ( ( F e. ( S NGHom T ) /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> ( F ` A ) e. ( Base ` T ) ) |
| 25 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( F e. ( S NGHom T ) /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> B e. V ) |
| 26 | 22, 25 | #P_ffvelrnd | |- ( ( F e. ( S NGHom T ) /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> ( F ` B ) e. ( Base ` T ) ) |
| 27 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( -g ` T ) = ( -g ` T ) |
| 28 | 13, 20, 27, 4 | #P_ngpds | |- ( ( T e. NrmGrp /\ ( F ` A ) e. ( Base ` T ) /\ ( F ` B ) e. ( Base ` T ) ) -> ( ( F ` A ) D ( F ` B ) ) = ( ( norm ` T ) ` ( ( F ` A ) ( -g ` T ) ( F ` B ) ) ) ) |
| 29 | 17, 24, 26, 28 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( F e. ( S NGHom T ) /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> ( ( F ` A ) D ( F ` B ) ) = ( ( norm ` T ) ` ( ( F ` A ) ( -g ` T ) ( F ` B ) ) ) ) |
| 30 | 2, 9, 27 | #P_ghmsub | |- ( ( F e. ( S GrpHom T ) /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> ( F ` ( A ( -g ` S ) B ) ) = ( ( F ` A ) ( -g ` T ) ( F ` B ) ) ) |
| 31 | 18, 30 | #P_syl3an1 | |- ( ( F e. ( S NGHom T ) /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> ( F ` ( A ( -g ` S ) B ) ) = ( ( F ` A ) ( -g ` T ) ( F ` B ) ) ) |
| 32 | 31 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( F e. ( S NGHom T ) /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> ( ( norm ` T ) ` ( F ` ( A ( -g ` S ) B ) ) ) = ( ( norm ` T ) ` ( ( F ` A ) ( -g ` T ) ( F ` B ) ) ) ) |
| 33 | 29, 32 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( ( F e. ( S NGHom T ) /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> ( ( F ` A ) D ( F ` B ) ) = ( ( norm ` T ) ` ( F ` ( A ( -g ` S ) B ) ) ) ) |
| 34 | 12, 2, 9, 3 | #P_ngpds | |- ( ( S e. NrmGrp /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> ( A C B ) = ( ( norm ` S ) ` ( A ( -g ` S ) B ) ) ) |
| 35 | 6, 34 | #P_syl3an1 | |- ( ( F e. ( S NGHom T ) /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> ( A C B ) = ( ( norm ` S ) ` ( A ( -g ` S ) B ) ) ) |
| 36 | 35 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( F e. ( S NGHom T ) /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> ( ( N ` F ) x. ( A C B ) ) = ( ( N ` F ) x. ( ( norm ` S ) ` ( A ( -g ` S ) B ) ) ) ) |
| 37 | 15, 33, 36 | #P_3brtr4d | |- ( ( F e. ( S NGHom T ) /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> ( ( F ` A ) D ( F ` B ) ) <_ ( ( N ` F ) x. ( A C B ) ) ) |
